help_description.en:
All commands have their own help available by sending the word "help"  after the command.
*for example: ${prefix}bp help*

command_addrole_help_description.en: This command will add on or more roles to a member.

command_addrole_help_example_two_descrip.en: Adds all the provided roles to @member.

command_appconfig_arg_channel_prompt.en: What channel should I post completed applications to?

command_appconfig_arg_questions_prompt.en:
Please type your application questions now with each question in a single message.
Type `stop` when you are done adding questions.

command_appconfig_help_description.en: This command is used to configure application questions and the channel to which completed applications are posted.

command_appconfig_response_error.en: I'm sorry, but there was a problem processing this command. Please notify a developer on the o7 support discord.

command_apply_help_description.en: This command is used to configure application questions and the channel to which completed applications are posted.

command_apply_response_error.en: I'm sorry, there was a problem with processing this command.

command_apply_response_success.en: Thank you, your application was submitted! Please wait while it is reviewed someone will get back with you soon.

command_blueprint_help_description.en: This command will return a list of all the resources and costs associated to build a given blueprint. Optionally, the resource and time costs will be adjusted based on skill levels, if provided.

command_blueprint_help_example_one_descr.en: Returns the resources and costs for a MK5 Hobgoblin at base rates for an unskilled character.

command_blueprint_help_example_two_descr.en: Returns the resources and costs for a Caracal Navy Issue adjusted for a character with Cruiser Manufacturing 5, Advanced Cruiser Manufacturing 5, and Expert Cruiser Manufacturing 2.

command_blueprint_help_example_three_des.en: Returns the resources and costs for a Vexor adjusted for a character with Cruiser Manufacturing 5, Advanced Cruiser Manufacturing 5, and Expert Cruiser Manufacturing 2 and Accounting 4, Advanced Accounting 1, and Expert Accounting 0.

command_blueprint_response_no_results.en: I'm sorry, I couldn't find anything for those search terms.

command_dataretention_embed_desc.en:
This bot will never collect any data from users for the purpose of sales, marketing or any other purpose that is not explicitly required for the functioning of this application.

Any user of this bot may request the deletion of any data containing their user and/or guild information via the following commands.

**!deleteguilddata** - Request deletion of all data related to the guild from which this command was executed.

**!deletemydata** - Request deletion of any data related to the user who executed this command.

command_dataretention_embed_guild_field_.en:
This bot will store the Guild ID for a server to associate it with configured settings for the bot, such as prefix, and disabled commands.

This bot will store the Guild ID and a Channel ID in order to associate it with application questions. *This data is only stored if an administrator has configured applications on the guild.*

command_dataretention_embed_user_field_v.en: No user data is stored at this time.

command_deleteguilddata_arg_confirmation.en:
**Warning!** this will delete all saved data for this server (guild).
There is no undo.

To confirm click ✅

command_deleteguilddata_delete_aborted.en: Phew! That was a close one.... delete aborted.
